name: Headhunter Agent
description: A specialized agent that searches for top talent candidates on LinkedIn and the web based on job title, region, and requirements
author: AgentHub Team

job_title.label: Job Title
job_title.description: The job title or position to search for
job_title.placeholder: Enter job title (e.g., Software Engineer, Data Scientist)

region.label: Region
region.description: Geographic region or location for the search
region.placeholder: Enter location (e.g., San Francisco, CA or Remote)

description.label: Job Description
description.description: Optional detailed job description or requirements

search_depth.label: Search Depth
search_depth.description: How many search variations to try (1-5)

candidates_per_search.label: Candidates per Search
candidates_per_search.description: Number of candidates to find per search (5-20)

include_remote.label: Include Remote Candidates
include_remote.description: Whether to include remote work candidates in the search
